description: Operations dependencies that are independent of any particular product or operations task shall be presented as segment dependencies.

contents.name: operationsSegmentFrom
contents.description: The source operations segment(s) that the target operations segment(s) are dependent. Operations segment has an association class relationship with segment dependency

contents.name: operationsSegmentTo
contents.description: The target operations segment(s) that are dependent on source operations segment(s). Operations segment has an association class relationship with segment dependency

contents.name: dependencyType
contents.description: Defines the execution dependency constraints of one segment to another segment.as the type of the execution or dependency factor between the segments

enumValues.name: possibleParallel
enumValues.description: B may run in parallel to A

enumValues.name: notInParallel
enumValues.description: B may not run in parallel to A

enumValues.name: noLaterAfterStart
enumValues.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A start

enumValues.name: noEarlierAfterStart
enumValues.description: start B no earlier than dependency factor after A start

enumValues.name: noLaterAfterEnd
enumValues.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A end

enumValues.name: noEarlierAfterEnd
enumValues.description: B no earlier than dependency factor after A end

contents.name: dependencyFactorUnitOfMeasure
